## DataSource.isVisible() method

Returns `true` if \[\[DataSource\]\] should be displayed for the zoom level.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isVisible(zoomLevel: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  zoomLevel | number | The zoom level of the \[\[MapView\]\]. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
